name: Project Launcher
description: Quickly locate and open local projects with your preferred editor

preferences.name: Trigger
preferences.description: Type this keyword to list all projects in the specified folder, and open them with your editor

preferences.name: Editor command
preferences.description: Specify the command to open projects (e.g., 'code' for VS Code, 'cursor' for Cursor editor, 'subl' for sublime, and other code editor)

preferences.name: Target folder
preferences.description: Folder to search for projects (e.g., '~/Project' or '/path/to/folder')

preferences.name: Search Depth
preferences.description: Maximum depth to search for projects (e.g., '4' means search up to 4 levels deep)

preferences.name: Cache Duration
preferences.description: How long to cache search results in seconds
